title: Rads Error
body:
Tried every trick under the sun, but whenever I try and launch LoL, get the pop up
Rads Error "Could not connect to HTTP server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled and your firewall isnt blocking access"
Things ive tried
+Changing Dns primary to 8888 and secondary to 8844, then CMD and flushing DNS, then trying to launch game through new Icon. Unsuccesful
+Uninstall and re download game into the suggested location, unsuccesful
+Reallowing LoL through firewall
+Competely disabling firewall
+Software is up to date

Plz help

replies.body:
There are a number of other network configurations that will commonly cause this error. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers the rest of the configurations you should check into, so I recommend you give those steps a go.

Let me know if this resolved your issue or if you're still experiencing this.
